archimate:Device.name: Security Infrastructure
archimate:Device.documentation:
Security Infrastructure This encompasses all the tools, policies, and systems that protect your computing environment: Cloud Security Infrastructure:
Identity and Access Management (IAM) services Network security groups and firewalls Encryption services for data at rest and in transit Security monitoring and logging services Compliance frameworks and audit tools Managed security services (WAF, DDoS protection) Shared responsibility model with cloud provider
On-Premise Security Infrastructure:
Physical security controls (data center access, surveillance) Network firewalls, intrusion detection/prevention systems Endpoint protection and antivirus solutions Identity management systems (Active Directory) Backup and disaster recovery systems Full responsibility for all security layers
